artist: Artist: Attributed to Pietro Antonio de' Pietri
description: mounted to ivory sheet with grey, green and pink borders; sketch; figure kneeling on one knee in LRC; standing figures at left; sketchy tall figures (sculpture?) in background
inscription:
Inscription

LLC, in brown: [tintorettino (?)]
on verso, in pen and brown ink: [V. Villareale]; in pencil, in Scarpa\'s hand: [Andrea Sacchi / pp. ax]
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on laid paper
provenance: [Pietro Scarpa, Venice, until 1985; sold, September 28, as by Andrea Sacchi, for $3,200, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1985-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Michelangelo Presenting the Moses of the Tomb of Pope Julius II to Pope Paul III
